dealbreakers_safety.title: Safety First
dealbreakers_safety.context: These help us keep everyone safe. Honest answers protect you and others.
dealbreakers_safety.funFact: Apps with safety-focused questions see 40% fewer negative experiences reported.

values_politics.title: What Matters to You
values_politics.context: Values alignment is one of the strongest predictors of long-term compatibility. No judgment here.
values_politics.funFact: Couples with aligned core values report 50% higher satisfaction after 5 years.

relationship_dynamics.title: How You Connect
relationship_dynamics.context: How you communicate matters more than what you communicate about.
relationship_dynamics.funFact: The way couples handle conflict predicts relationship success better than how often they agree.

attachment_emotional.title: Your Emotional World
attachment_emotional.context: Understanding your attachment style helps find compatible partners. There's no 'wrong' style.
attachment_emotional.funFact: About 50% of people have secure attachment. All styles can have healthy relationships.

lifestyle_compatibility.title: Daily Life
lifestyle_compatibility.context: Night owl or early bird? Homebody or adventurer? Finding your match starts here.
lifestyle_compatibility.funFact: Couples with compatible daily routines report less day-to-day friction.

family_future.title: Looking Ahead
family_future.context: Big life goals deserve honest conversations. Better to know now than later.
family_future.funFact: Alignment on family goals is in the top 3 predictors of relationship longevity.

sex_intimacy.title: Physical Connection
sex_intimacy.context: Physical compatibility matters. These questions help find someone on the same page.
sex_intimacy.funFact: Couples who discuss physical needs openly report higher satisfaction.

personality_temperament.title: Your Personality
personality_temperament.context: Introverts and extroverts can absolutely work together. Just helps to know!
personality_temperament.funFact: Research shows personality differences can complement each other in relationships.

hypotheticals_scenarios.title: What If...
hypotheticals_scenarios.context: How you'd handle situations reveals a lot about compatibility. Have fun with these!
hypotheticals_scenarios.funFact: Hypothetical questions often reveal more about values than direct questions.

location_specific.title: Where You're At
location_specific.context: City mouse or country mouse? Both are great - just helps find your match.
location_specific.funFact: Geographic compatibility is often overlooked but crucial for long-term success.

dos: Find good lighting - natural light from a window works great
Look at the camera like you're talking to a friend
Talk about what genuinely excites you
Smile naturally - forced smiles are obvious
Mention specific interests, not just 'I like music'
It's okay to be a little nervous - it's endearing
donts: Don't try to be someone you're not
Don't script every word - natural is better
Don't focus only on what you're looking for
prompts: Tell us about something you're passionate about
What's a story your friends always ask you to tell?
What does a perfect weekend look like for you?
